My only annoyance is the fact that they claim to be light weight. These are not light weight shoes by any means. They are actually very heavy and a lot heavier than my other trainers.
reviews.review_title: Good quality, but not light weight

reviews.review_content: Very comfortable & light but look really casual & with the added toe protection,are ideal for my job.Order your normal size as they fit perfectly.

Quick delivery, lightweight safety shoes. I ordered a 6 but had to size down. Bought for warehouse work. First nite they did hurt my toes a little but seem to be OK now. Dont think they will last forever, but at £24 and I have a second boot to swap, so I'm not wearing every night, I'm happy with them so far. Ordered the grey but ended up with the blue due to sizes left.
Delivered on time
Seems to be good quality and comfortable after wearing them a day
Bought these for my son and he said they are comfortable and not so bulky as the boots he has
Really comfortable and light weight
They are comfortable but for a full shift at work expect aching feet still

These trainers being safely rated with steel toe caps, they are bulkier than your standard trainer but they look surprisingly good still. I really like the colourway on theses with the contrasting blue. Anti slip heel and good cushioning underfoot. One of the steel toecaps feels more uncomfortable than the other though, rubbing against the top of my toe on one foot - not sure if it's the trainer or just how I walk. Overall good quality though.

The only downside to these trainers for me is the weight of them. They are not quite is lightweight as I was expecting. Especially after reading the product description. That aside, I have found them to be very comfortable to wear for prolonged periods of time and true to size. The trainers offer great support and feel sturdy too. Recommended.

I have been wearing a pair of safety shoes/trainers from SROTER for the past year and have been really pleased with them, both with their comfort level and with the safety they have provided (i have stepped on several large nails, which have penetrated the sole, but not gone through the Kevlar midsole), but the soles have now started to wear and could do with replacing, so i thought i would give this model a try.I must say that I really quite like the look of this product (although they look a little chunkier around the heel/sole than I would typically like). It has a nice modern design with their black to grey fade colour scheme.  They are light weight and very comfortable to wear for long periods of time.The upper is made from a woven mesh, giving quite a nice appearance and unlike my previous moel that had a “sock design”, meaning there is no tongue, this one is more like a regular shoe, offering a little more support at the heel.The outer sole is quite thick, adding to the cushioning effect on your feet to help with fatigue and has a Kevlar midsole to offer protection from puncturing (up to 1100 N) and of course the toe box has a steel cap to protect your toes from impacts, providing up to 200J / 15KN of crush protection.I ordered these trainers in my usual size 9 and they do fit very nicely. There is just enough wiggle room without them feeling too big.So as far as looks and comfort go, I think this is a great product and performs very well in both areas.The only thing i am not too keen on is the design of the sole, which feels a little slippery. When on the feet, i found them to be quite slippery on carpeted surfaces, but not bad on wood or concrete, although i have a feeling they won’t cope very well with wet or damp surfaces and i’m not sure that they will wear particularly well if your job involves a lot of walking.If they last as well as my previous pair from SROTER, then i think the £39.99 asking price is pretty reasonable and definitely worth considering if you need a pair of safety shoes to wear all day.
reviews.review_title: SROTER - YIYEP - Steel Toe Cap Trainers Safety Shoes

reviews.review_content: I have been looking for a cheap good quality shoe for a long time and came across these yesterday!!! Wow wow wow these have to be the most comfortable safety shoe on the market as I’ve tried other brands and they come nowhere near to these shoes ! Very light and don’t make your feet sweat and plenty of room for your toes !! I was shocked how good the quality is for the price and I work in a hot and humid warehouse and my feet don’t sweat like other brands I have used and honestly it’s like walking on clouds that is how comfortable these are !!!!!FANTASTIC PRODUCT 5⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Having worn safety footwear during various jobs, it is great to have a pair of safety shoes that are good enough to wear with jeans.The shoes are very lightweight and comfortable to wear from first day.
They are excellent very comfortable and very durable excellent quality.

I ordered a 'large', the shirt size that I always have worn--and still wear--and have to give the shirt to my wife, especially after washing. I ordered another, this time XL, and it fits fine. Passform und GrößeDas Flanellhemd von Amazon Essentials enttäuscht in Bezug auf die Passform und Größe. Es fällt deutlich zu groß aus und entspricht nicht den Erwartungen an ein angenehm sitzendes Hemd. Die Passform wirkt unvorteilhaft und trägt nicht zu einem ansprechenden Erscheinungsbild bei.Verarbeitung und DesignAbgesehen von der Größe scheint die Verarbeitung und das Design des Hemdes durchschnittlich zu sein. Allerdings kann die schlechte Passform das Gesamterscheinungsbild erheblich beeinträchtigen und den Komfort beim Tragen deutlich mindern.Qualität und TragekomfortDie Größenprobleme und die unvorteilhafte Passform beeinträchtigen den Tragekomfort dieses Hemdes erheblich. Die Qualität des Flanellmaterials und die Verarbeitung scheinen jedoch im Allgemeinen in Ordnung zu sein, aber die falsche Passform nimmt dem Träger jeglichen Komfort.FazitDas Amazon Essentials Herren Flanellhemd mit seinen zwei Taschen und langen Ärmeln enttäuscht insgesamt aufgrund seiner unpassenden Größe und unvorteilhaften Passform. Obwohl andere Qualitätsmerkmale möglicherweise akzeptabel sind, überwiegen die Größenprobleme und die schlechte Passform, was das Hemd zu einer weniger attraktiven Wahl macht.

My husband always wants two pockets so he can carry around his collection of pens and other items he wants to keep on him. At the same time, he wants a classic shirt, and these are difficult to find with pockets. This one fulfils this function perfectly, and it's also thick and warm for winter. I bought this shirt to wear as a layer while motorcycling in the winter. I always want to look fashionable and wear a sturdy shirt with my motorcycle gear. This shirt is perfect for that purpose and can be worn for three seasons.I am 178cm tall and weigh 100kg, and the XL size fits me well with a base layer underneath and some room to spare. The fabric is soft and comfortable to wear. The shirt is both warm and stylish, and it can be worn casually as well.I have washed and tumble dried the shirt, and the fabric's softness has not been affected, and the shirt has not shrunk. I also tried to air dry the shirt to test another reviewer's claim that it didn't require ironing. However, I had to iron it as there were multiple creases, and it would not have looked good without ironing.Overall, it was a good purchase, and the price/performance ratio is excellent. I strongly recommend it.

I Was a bit dubious - as I am quite tall and not a slim-jim, I wondered just how this would fit - well it fits very well indeed. Material has not been skimped and feels very good - after a few washed that may change but for the cost it is better than I expected. Collar size would be a little tight if I am honest but with a casual shirt how many times does one have the collar done up? Good price/material/size - thoroughly recommended (I don't often write reviews!)
reviews.review_title: Good fit, well worth the money

This is a cold-weather working shirt made from thicker brushed fabric (aka flannel) and I wear it about the house and garden during the winter months. Very good price, quick (next day) delivery by Amazon Prime. Quality is better than than many cheap shirts I have known - eg fabric pattern is woven-in, not printed; double buttoned cuffs (so you can have them tighter or looser fit), and two button-down pockets. Happy to recommend and I will buy again.
reviews.review_title: Very comfortable shirt at very good price

I've only ever worn shop bought Calvin's and can honestly say they hold the meat and 2 veg nicely. Never had any issues with fitting, rubbing or quality.Since seeing this bargain, I have been purchasing my Calvin's from Amazon.......but I'm not so sure I will continue.The last few I have bought instantly got holes in them after the first wash. And for some reason, they feel like they are rubbing on my inside leg, causing a bit of soreness.The quality of the material seems OK, until they get washed........something just isn't quite right with them. The picture I shared is after 2 wears and 2 washes. I'm going to buy one more pack, if I get the same problem I'm probably going to return the lot of them.
reviews.review_title: Hmmmm, something not quite right about these.....

reviews.review_content: I do not ever do reviews about products but I got this a pack of 3 on Monday delivered because my old pairs had been ripping (I thought this was due to wear and tear) but evidently this isn’t the case as it is just two days into wearing these and they have clean ripped, not even in the crotch area but right at the front..you would think it’s a gimmick but I guess my girlfriend might be happy. Not to say the company selling this product is bad but yes I think my time with Calvin is up.
The legs on the pants  are shorter than that look in the picture
Fit good material nice but did not need my tip covered in bits of black cotton
I ordered 9 pairs of boxers in total but one had a tear in the seam. It doesn’t seem like I can get a replacement. The rest are great…
Pleased with the whole service
Fit perfectly
Not sure I'd pay the RRP, but when on sale these are good value. Very comfortable, good quality material and fit and the design is nice and smart.
Excellent quality- good fit - good price 10/10

These pants are good quality - warm with superb elastic and plenty of room in the pouch.I normally take L size but the elastic was a little too tight for me and accentuated my spare tyre. XL were perfect.
reviews.review_title: Very warm and comfy if you take a size up

reviews.review_content: Excellent seller, good quality CK boxers at a reasonable price, recommended, thank you.
I've tried many sorts of boxers and brands but I still believe these are the most comfortable. Price is high but I feel this is right price for the quality you receive.
Very comfortable and good quality
The quality and feel is just great! Love the material and the fit was perfect!
Buy these normally from the high street where they are at least £10 more expensive. Love the fact that with prime they are delivered the very next day!
Son was happy with this product, nice fit and comfortable
Well pleased with them would buy them again

reviews.review_content: False advertisingReally are rubbish for people who work on sites on their feet all dayDon’t botherRUBBISH
reviews.review_title: Holed in a couple of wears

reviews.review_content: Bought these for using in Work boots, and after while found the soles of my feet were starting to scab over and bits were falling off. I do have soft, sensitive feet ( Bless ! ) and I'm not sure if it is the socks or the boots, but swapped to merino wool walking socks and problem disappeared within a week
reviews.review_title: My feet started rotting away !  Avoid if you have sensitive skin

reviews.review_content: The heel fabric is regular woven, not re-inforced where you need it most.Worn each pair 3 times only and the heels on 2 of the pairs have big worn out holes in them already. Shocking!These will be no good for regular walkers, hikers or runners. Even less so if your job is physical & outdoors.For normal, day to day wear, they will be fine.I bought these as they have elasticated arch support and good ankle support. I needed a good, strong sock for outdoor working & thought these would be better than most out there. How disappointing as they look and feel great. Just no heel strength in the fabric. Needs doubling up, especially for the paid price. Not cheap.

Very hight priced item. Went to costco today and saw similar item nearly 8£ cheap including vat. Though I couldn't see much difference between products, say if this item is a bit superior in quality, this doesn't mean that the price should be nearly double.
The only thing these socks wicked away was my cash! Good for synthetic winter socks that's it returned
Size shown on Amazon is American which is smaller than U.K. and stocks shrink when washed even on cold wash.

At first they were a perfect fit and seemed like a quality material.After a few washes, they have shrunk so much I cannot get them on. I've tried stretching them when wet, but no, still too small  to wear, definitely cutting off circulation.
reviews.review_title: After a few washes, they have shrunk.

reviews.review_content: I have small ankles. When bought (as another reviewer has stated), they were a little tight aroumd the ankles, but after 2 cool washes and air drying, they have become so tight that they give me pain in the feet due to restricted blood flow. I have size 9 feet .They are now completeley unwearable and so a waste of money as the return window has closed. Be very careful concerning the size; cannot imagine what they would be like on a bigger foot! a great shame as they were very comfortable.
reviews.review_title: They are tight round the ankles (size 9-11) on a size 9 foot and shrink even on a cool wash.

reviews.review_content: Felt comfortable when I first put them on. After a long walk they gave me a horrendous rash which was swollen, very hot and painful on both legs. Day three after and my legs are yet to recover. I am used to walking long distances and have never had this problem before. As a woman of average build, size 6, I ordered mens size 6-9. I think they cut off my circulation or I've had a reaction to something they have put in the sock band. Not good at all for me.

These socks are advertised in American sizes not UK so smaller than expectedAmazon seem unable to understand my frustration when I brought this to their attention  that the advert is misleading and needs changedOnly option given by Amazon is to return
The main body of the sock is comfortable but I find the grip around the ankle is very tight, I have decided not to wear them because of this.

Wore these for the first time on a proper hike, I now have blisters on both big toes. Looking at the inside of the socks there is a seam across the top of the toes, where this ends on the side of the big toe there is a bit of a lump for want of a better description. This has caused some nasty blisters of both toes. They are also, as stated by some other reviewers quite tight around the calf. I wouldn't recommend them if you do any serious mileage.

As I suffer from very clod feet in the Winter months I did a bit of research and asked a few questions regarding these socks. Based on this info I went ahead and purchased them. In my opinion they are Not very warm at all and are a disappointment. With my old woolen socks I could stand on cold floor tiles and not feel the cold whereas with these socks I feel the cold almost immediately. I realise they are not the most expensive of socks but I had really expected and wanted them to be "just right", they are far from that. I now realise that socks with zero wool content just dont do it for me.

Arrived undamaged by German postal service. Each pair has a cardboard insert, stating XL. However, I take UK size 9 shoes, and they are too tight, so I think they are size Large - mislabeled. Warm enough I wore a pair to bed, but woke up with constriction pain to my feet. Also, I wear a pair of old, thin, socks over them, most of the time, as if I wear a pair of shoes, or boots, with non-smooth, padded lining -or rough/damaged lining, the socks chaff - causing excessive wear. UPDATE: MAY 2022. The use of an "over sock" solved the wear issue; but I have found they shrink in a cold wash, and require some stretching, before reusing them. I don't recommend them.

These socks feel great but they’re far too right round the ankles. I’ve not got fat legs either. I’ve had the first wash with a few of the pairs and that’s made it worse, the wash was a quick wash at 30 degrees. They’re actually so tight it feels like the blood circulation is getting cut off. The rest of the sock size is great

Feel good quality BUT they are a very tight fit. I am a normal width size 10 but these socks are just too tight. They are so snug that they actually prevented me walking normally. I do not have large ankles but these would cause problems to anyone that did. They look and feel good but just don't fit properly. Only ever air dried them as a tumble dryer would render them unwearableGave them to my size 6 child who also found them difficult to pull on.

way to small - just cotton terry socks - that fray very quicklythey cut the blood off to your feet they are too small by far for my size 10 UK feet my wife thinks they are too tight and she is size 7!These are very ordinary socks wrapped with a huge load of hype marketing
reviews.review_title: way to small - just cotton terry socks - that fray very quickly

reviews.review_content: I've been type 1 diabetic for many years and now have nerve damage, and feet need extra care. I walk my dog six times a week so a good pair of socks is vital.I read the reviews and thought I'd give these a go. They are nice and comfy, and feel good on the feet.However the socks 'ride down with wear' even on a relatively short walk I have to pull up my socks two or three times, which is annoying and frustrating. Also after wearing a pair of socks  fifteen times I've end up with this gaping hole, I'm not impressed...
reviews.review_title: Comfy, but rides down with wear and not long lasting

reviews.review_content: Looked  good were warm but on for 1 day  and now a holes in them  try and make  stronger with  more material  in them
reviews.review_title: 1 day on  they were  nice  and warm  but poor  quality  not enough  material in them

reviews.review_content: The socks are great. Been wearing this brand for ages but disappointed that I only received 4 pairs of black when the order was for 5 pairs of blue. To much hassle to return the entire order and wait again for one pair. Why can't I just have my missing pair sent too me. 🥺🤷‍♂️
reviews.review_title: Supposed to be 5 pairs in the order. Only received 4.

reviews.review_content: Not bad, they wore threw after a year of use. Take long time to dry if that's an issue for you. If recommend Bridge dale merino socks, more expensive but better for exped.

These are my 2nd set - I walk a lot, as a result after a year I’ve nearly worn out, original set - this new set is neither as thick nor high up on leg, a little disappointing1st set 5 stars this merely a 3 unfortunately
I had the same socks about  year ago for work bought these because I thought I was getting the same quality as before these are no where near

You get what you pay for I suppose. These unfortunately make my feet sweaty and don't provide the warmth they look like they should. Seems you have to spend big money nowadays to get warm and breathable socks

I found these socks a little tight fitting. I’m a size 10, so thought these 11.5’s would be ok. Well designed with good padding, but not for me. Having said that, perhaps a little give will happen over a few washes. Maybe, maybe not. Can’t be bothered to return - packaging etc gone.
The socks are good quality but are tight fitting.Order the next size up if you wear 8-9.

I really like these socks, comfy, padded, warm and soft however, even after buying the larger size, they are just falling down every 5 minutes right down to my ankles. Dont know if anyone else has this issue but it's making me not want to wear these anymore.

I like these but they are very tight. I had to streatch them over a wine bottle for a week to make them comfortable . Would have sent back but did not use them for a few months. I am a 9, suggest you order a bigger size is they do one.
These socks are quite thin and the size 9 only just fitted my size 9 feet. The elastic is also very tight. They are not thick hiking socks by any means.
Lovely socks but haven't lasted very long with my boots, I would like some replacements if possible?

These Socks are a reliable choice if you're seeking a balance between affordability and quality. With their impressive comfort, breathability, and warmth, these socks offer a great value for the price.One of the main positives of these socks is their affordability. Compared to other brands in the market, YUEDGE provides a pack of five socks at a reasonable cost without compromising on key features. For those on a budget, this option allows you to stock up on multiple pairs of high-quality socks without breaking the bank.In terms of comfort, these socks excel. The cushioned sole provides a plush and comfortable feel, making them ideal for long walks, athletic activities, or everyday wear. The added cushioning helps reduce foot fatigue, providing support throughout the day. Whether you're on your feet for extended periods or engaged in physical activities, these socks keep your feet comfortable and cozy.The breathability of the socks is another commendable feature. The wicking technology efficiently draws moisture away from the skin, keeping your feet dry and fresh even during intense workouts. This is particularly important in preventing odors and maintaining overall foot hygiene. The breathable design ensures that air circulates freely, enhancing the overall comfort and freshness of your feet.Furthermore, these socks offer excellent warmth, which is particularly beneficial during colder months or in chilly climates. The combination of high-quality materials and thoughtful design helps to insulate your feet, keeping them warm and cozy. This feature makes these socks suitable for outdoor activities or simply lounging around the house on a cold day.However, one downside to note is that these socks may wear out more quickly compared to some higher-end brands I have tried. While they offer great value for the price, the durability of the socks could be improved. With regular use and washing there are signs of wear and tear, particularly in high-friction areas such as the heels. It's important to consider this aspect if you're looking for socks that will withstand heavy use over an extended period.In conclusion, these Socks offer an affordable and comfortable option for everyday wear, athletic activities, and casual outings. The cushioned sole provides excellent comfort and support, while the breathability and warmth ensure a pleasant experience for your feet. While the durability could be better, these socks still offer good value for the price. If you're looking for budget-friendly socks that prioritize comfort and performance, the YUEDGE socks are a solid choice.
reviews.review_title: Good value and comfortable but durability of the socks could be improved.

reviews.review_content: When they are new they are fine and comfy but i noticed after a wash they are shrinking and causing pain in my 9.5 feet feet so i'll have to ditch these i'm afraid
reviews.review_title: Comfy but shrink in the wash

reviews.review_content: These are for my husband and he really likes them.

I give these 4* because they start off great and really soft and awesome for walking. But after 2-3 months or so, they become very hard and start to wear through. I do walk a lot everyday, so maybe thats the reason - but because they are cheap, I keep coming back to them. Perhaps its worth trying a more expensive pair next time.
reviews.review_title: Start off great - then fall apart

reviews.review_content: Great socks
I like the socks! They're generally comfortable and fit well.The cuff is a little too tight but not uncomfortably so.
Lovely and soft, a bit tight on the tops
Nice socks
Nice socks, very comfortable, good value for money,  arrived quickly and safely 👍
Worn with my hiking shoes these are comftable warm and supportive

Ex-Military (decades of service so I know a thing or two about good socks - and bad!)These are easily in the top 3 types of socks I have ever owned, including 1000 miles socks and similar! Comfy, not too tight but snug, warm but not boiling, the material is really “feel good”. I wear these socks for up to 12 hours a day and they don’t disintegrate, roll, or fluff up - they don’t cause the foot to overheat either but are nice and warm.Bought a box for my arborist Son for Christmas and an additional box for me, such is my satisfaction with them. Price is great for this quality.Stop looking for socks - you’ve just found them!

**Review: YUEDGE Socks – Where Comfort Meets Quality**I recently had the pleasure of trying out YUEDGE socks, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed. As someone who values both comfort and quality in everyday wear, these socks exceeded my expectations in every way possible.Let's talk about comfort. From the moment I slipped my feet into these socks, I could feel the luxurious softness embracing my skin. The material used is incredibly gentle, yet durable, providing a snug fit without feeling restrictive. Whether I'm running errands, working out, or simply lounging at home, these socks provide the perfect balance of cushioning and breathability. Even during long hours of wear, my feet remained dry and comfortable, thanks to the excellent moisture-wicking properties of the fabric.One of the standout features of YUEDGE socks is their ergonomic design. The socks conform perfectly to the contours of my feet, offering support in all the right places. The reinforced heel and toe areas provide extra cushioning and durability, ensuring that these socks are built to last. The seamless toe closure eliminates the discomfort of traditional socks, making them ideal for individuals with sensitive skin or those prone to irritation.What truly sets YUEDGE socks apart is their versatility. Whether I'm wearing sneakers, boots, or casual shoes, these socks fit like a dream. The elasticated cuffs keep them securely in place, preventing annoying slipping or bunching inside my shoes. Plus, they come in a variety of styles and colors, making it easy to find the perfect pair for any outfit or occasion.In addition to their unparalleled comfort, YUEDGE socks are also incredibly easy to care for. They maintain their shape and softness even after multiple washes, a testament to the high-quality craftsmanship and materials used in their production.In conclusion, YUEDGE socks are a true revelation in the world of comfortable footwear. If you're someone who values both coziness and durability, these socks are an absolute must-have. I wholeheartedly recommend YUEDGE socks to anyone seeking the perfect blend of comfort, quality, and style. Treat your feet to the luxury they deserve – you won't be disappointed!
Lovely warm and comfortable
Socks are very good quality, breatheable, comfort and warm as well. Even after few washes they are still look like new, not losing colour or quality.

Well worth the money. Bought these for work wearing them with workboots 8-10 hours a day. On first sighting thought the leg was a bit short but not at all. Very stretchy and great to wear. Hopefully last for a while.

I use socks for both lazing around the house but also for multi-day hikes around the year. The ability to provide warmth in winter but coolness in summer is both possible and required (breathability is the most important factor for this) and feeling good against the skin even after multiple days so I can get away with bringing less. Quick drying is also an important factor.These are, without doubt, the most comfortable non-merino socks I've used (baring in mind I stick to budget prices).
Comfortable and warm
I'm a 60 year old plasterer. I honestly didn't know socks like this existed. If you're in the building game, get yourself some of these.
So far so good,really comfortable socks

First impressions very soft and comfotable. Does appear to keep feet dry and, unlike normal thin poly/cotton socks, dryer. No idea on the longevity being so soft but am happy with the purchase. Note that the washing instructions state 'Hand wash cold; line dry in the shade; do not wring or twist' so may take a while to dry!

reviews.review_content: Worn by my son to school. He walks to the school across the road.  The sole got holes by month 3. The photos are after 4 months.  Absolute rubbish.Are these even genuine kickers?
reviews.review_title: Dreadful quality, not even lasted a school term

reviews.review_content: Appalling. Worn by a skinny 14 yr old for 5 months and now they look like this.  Should not be sold as a school shoe, as they're clearly not fit for purpose.
These shoes have fallen apart after 3 months of use everytime it rains my sons shoes and feet are soaked and this is bacuse the bottom sole is falling apart!!!  I have taken photos
Why do these shoes fall apart in less then a weeks time.
My son has had these on a month and the green logo on the back has completely come off
Had so many decent pairs of Kickers, thought nothing about ordering these.Sadly, wrong size in the correct box - madness.No choice but to return.
reviews.review_title: Seems to like sending size 42 shoes in size 44 box.

reviews.review_content: Bought a pair for my son and within 3weeks, it's sole came off from the front of the shoe...
After wearing for 2 days at school the stitching has come apart, returned item and waiting on refund

So I thought that since Kickers brand is well known and given the expensive price it would last for a year and more, but... IT ONLY TOOK 2 MONTHS TO FALL APART AND PEEL OFF!!!!A terrible quality for a well known brand! After this experience I don't think I would ever buy from Kickers.Returned for refund.
Not even a month old and the shoe is coming away from the bottom. Complete waste of money
Get distorted after a few months of use. Not the kickers quality we use to get. Just thin material these days.
Bought for my son for school and they haven’t even lasted 3 months! Really disappointed!Thought these would last longer, now I have to buy another pair which isn’t very cost effective!Gutted 😢
Unfortunately with less than two months use the stitching has come away on front toe of the shoe.
These shoes look smart I bought them for school shoes, but after a month the heel is wearing out so not a good buy for everyday wear.
Definitely not made like they were back in the 90sFeel ok for shoes but overpriced massively
Really disappointed with these, I purchased at the end of August for my son to wear to school, and by the beginning of December the stitching was coming undone and they were splitting. 👎🏼
Just 2 small
I had to rerun these shoes as there is a Kickers label sewn into the shoe right under your heel which makes the shoes uncomfortable to wear.
Ordered a 6.5 shoe size and they sent me a size 7 lucky for them they fitted fine but you should get what you order

Photos of these shoes show 5 pairs of lace holes which my son preferred to his previous pair of Kickers that have 2 pairs of holes.Ordered a size 10 and the shoes delivered have only 2 pairs of lace holes.... Not a big problem but they are not as advertised.His last pair lasted a reasonable amount of time before they literally fell apart - holes in the soles, holes in the tops, uppers coming away from the soles completely; we'll see how long these last

I have owned Kickers all my adult life. They are usually hard-wearing and stylish. These, however, have a  rectangular leather patch bearing the company logo, stitched onto the inside, right where your heel goes. This has evidently been designed by someone who hates the sort of people who wear Kickers. I had occasion to walk a mile or so in these today, and now I have a painful, rectangular blister on each heel. So buy them - they're nice shoes, they don't wear out quickly. But buy some insoles, too.
reviews.review_title: Buy these by all means, but buy insoles too.

reviews.review_content: My son started school in September, its October 25th n they look shocking!!! Need new!
reviews.review_title: Not made like they used to be!!!

reviews.review_content: Very smart, on trend, school shoe. Fit as expected on the first pair ordered, but unfortunately after just 2 days of wear, the sole started to become detached from the shoe at the toe section.  This is very unexpected for Kickers as usually they are very well made so I presume we had a faulty pair.  Returned the Kickers and a replacement was sent, however, the replacement sent was not the size we ordered so had to return the 2nd pair too.The shoe itself is a wide fit. Perfect for my son as his foot width is off the chart.

This is my second purchase, unfortunately the red and green bits came off the bottom of the shoes quite soon and the laces soon frayed. Cheaper than high street but not sure you get the value to be honest as they just don’t seem to last and look quite scruffy now.

Well what can I say, these are not for rigorous wear.They are quite soft, soft lining too.If you are a light walker then these will work.Bought these for my son to wear to school, they lasted 2  1/2 months.Still love kickers and buying him the tougher ones.
I bought this for my son's school. He wore it for a few months before it spoiled. I realised this is not original
My kids like them for school,they’re confortable,not first time buying,can be a bit less in price,,.
Lovely shoes but very narrow or I would've kept them.
Comfy and lasting

So leather is the way to go for comfort we all know this and these do not disappoint, they will relax slightly over time I know as these are my second pair but that just adds to a great fitting shoe that kind of moulds to your feet.These shoes are a little pricey but ultimately worth it.
Very cheap a nice
Great shoes, very comfy. Disappointing to see that the box was so badly damaged as we keep our shoes in their boxes but had to throw this one away.
Size 10 and he's eleven! great fit, now we have to see how they last at secondary school.

Nice shoes

Great quality and true to size.

good product

reviews.review_content: Absolut lächerliche Qualität. Die Buchstaben sind nur aufgeklebt und gehen beim Waschen direkt ab. Retoure ist nur über ein vom Händler erstelltes Rücksendeetikett möglich und geht nach China, wo der Pullover wahrscheinlich direkt entsorgt wird. Fast Fashion in schlechter Qualität vom Feinsten. Der Versand hat zudem auch 2 Wochen gedauert. Kauft euch lieber was vernünftiges, denn hier kauft ihr Schrott.

Der Pulli riecht stark chemisch. Die Fäden sind nicht gut vernäht. Das Bündchen ist leicht gelb und nicht in der Farbe vom Pulli. Das schlimmste jedoch ist, dass der Verkäufer kein Rücksendeetikett übersendet das lesbar ist. Es werden nur Hyroglyphen ausgedruckt, so dass es einem eine Rücksendung unmöglich macht.Ich habe das Amazon Team zur Lösung eingeschaltet.Der Pulli hat eigentlich keinen Stern verdient.

Entspricht eine völlig andere Farbe als auf dem Bild! Schlecht verarbeitet! Rücksendung nicht möglich, da das Rücksendeetikett nicht lesbar ist! Kosten für die Rücksendung müssen auch selbst getragen werden, obwohl mir kostenloser Rücksendung geworben wird!? Finger weg!

Nach nur 2 mal waschen war der komplette vordere Print weg. Am Arm ist er tatsächlich noch geblieben aber das ist auch ein anderes Material. Deswegen bin ich nicht zufrieden mit diesem ESSENTIALS HOODIE

Die Rücksendung wird einem unmöglich gemacht, da das Label nur mit Schriftzeichen ausgestellt wird - keine Adresse oä ist erkennbar. Auch ist selber zu frankieren, obwohl mit FREE RETURN beworben wird.
sehr schlechte Qualität, Nähte nicht ordentlich und riecht sehr chemisch und dann noch auf eigene Kosten nach Asien zurück, ganz klar keine Kaufempfehlung
reviews.review_title: Schrott einmal um die Welt gereist

reviews.review_content: Der bestellte Pullover kam in einer ganz anderen Farbe, als das Bild auf Amazon gezeigt hat. Das Zurücksenden würde dem Verkäufer 20€ kosten, was ohnehin schwierig ist, da das Rücksende-Etikett unvollständig ist. Besser Finger von diesem Produkt lassen.
Die Qualität ist verdammt schlecht. Die Buchstaben sind nur notdürftig aufgeklebt. Beim ersten Waschen war die Hälfte weg
Die große passt total nicht zum EU Große.Komischerweise die S ist tatsächlich ein L.
Schöner hoodie, fällt dir m aber sehr groß aus. Lieber eine Nr kleiner bestellen .

reviews.review_content: Purchased these for a holiday .. big mistake..Because they are soft material they press down so hard on my big toe and after 30 mins I have to remove the shoe because of the pain. I had plenty of space inside the shoeWould avoid these .. not comfortable what so ever

Really disappointed in these shoes. I’ve had them a few weeks but they have developed a squeak on the right shoe and makes the squeak every single step. I foolishly didn’t read the reviews but they are all saying the same - Squeaky Shoes. Do not buy.

After one day, these will not stop squeaking, creating a continuous noise when walking; considering the cost, they are simply not good enough. The quality of Nike products has declined, and as a result, these are being sent back.

I’ve had these shoes all of about 2 weeks before i noticed an annoying noise when I was walking home one day. I brushed it off thinking it was just because the bottom of the shoes were wet but a couple days later it began making that same noise again, this time more often. Gradually as the days passed the squeaking became louder and even started happening when they were not wet, what baffled me was that it squeaked even when they were dry and I was walking on carpet???? I have to imagine it’s due to the poor design of the sole but at the end of the day, don’t buy these, there’s a reason there was such a good deal on them and it’s because they’re crap and no one else wanted to buy them.
reviews.review_title: Don’t buy. They squeak and break easily

reviews.review_content: soles come away after 4 weeks of wearing as school shoes

    Only had for a month and it squeaks on every step it take. Super annoying. I will take it up with Nike. Avoid this trainers.

i dont ask much from a trainer but, when i walk i don't want a squeak. i thought it may be the way i walk but when i returned form holiday i was walking along the corridor of the airport and i could hear, squeak, squeak , squeak. i tried to walk differently but the squeak was still there. then i noticed in front of me walking was someone with the same Nike shoes, it was his shoes that were making the squeak as well. shame, they look good and fit well. but the squeak will take away.

reviews.review_title: if you want to sound like SpongeBob then buy these trainers

reviews.review_content: There must be mice in these shoes. They squeak. If you like squeaking mice then these are the shoes for you. Otherwise, avoid like a mice plague
reviews.review_title: Don’t buy unless you like mice

reviews.review_content: Like the design very comfortable only problem is they make a squeaky  noise when you walk in them on hard floors not good for nike 😕
Whilst they are undoubtably comfortable, the trainers squeak when walking so I have returned as not fit for purpose.
The right shoe makes a weird noise when walking. Super annnoying.The back of the shoe is pretty uncomfortable too.

I have bought these shoes for my son before.  He finds them very comfortable.  Unfortunately, with this new pair, an extremely annoying squeak developed in one of the shoes.  It is not soft of subtle in sound.  This has changed is gait pattern as he tries to limit the sound as he walks.  Very annoying, I have had to buy him another pair of shoes.  Total waste of money as they are still in good condition... I must say... I would tell him to put up with it, if the squeak was not so loud! 2 stars because they are still a comfortable shoe.  Lost 3 stars because they are unstable due to the sound...

I’ve never worn a pair of trainers that squeak on and possible type of flooring. Cannot wait these on a treadmill at all. It’s so loud and distracting the amount of noise from these. They we’re comfortable until they spill in the sole

They look great. They’re comfortable. Not a bad price. I like them so much I named them. The left one I call bubble and the right one. Not sure yet. Although I’m perplexed by the fact that there seems to be a mouse that follows me around since I started wearing them. We have great conversations. Although whenever I ask him/her a question, the response always sounds like ‘squeak’.Apart from that… great!

This review would have been 5 star had these trainers not developed such a loud noise whilst walking that my son now refuses to wear them. It sounds like he is passing wind with every step. Embarrassing!
First of all I've got 2 blisters on my heels the first day of wearing these Nike trainers. Secondly they make squelching noises when walking.I'm convinced these are knock offs.
Comfy material and hasn't frayed or anything so decent quality.However they got wet once when it snowed and now they squeak with every step I take.

Very comfy and lightweight. Have used them a few times a week since September and seem durable.Only downside is they often make a loud squelch/ squeaking noise when walking (not wet). This can be a bit embarrassing and sometimes means I do not wear them. This has happened since they came out of the box and continues now 6 months on!

Bought these about a year ago for working in a bakery. You’ll notice after about a month of wearing them that they'll squeak with every step and once you realise it'll irritate the life out of you. Ive recently replaced them with another brand because the squeaking got far too annoying.Ive noticed that alot of other people I work with have the same shoes and the same issue, and have seen people complain online about it so its a design flaw in the actual shoe, not just me going insane.Other than that, theyre fairly comfortable and pretty durable. After a year of working 40+ hours a week theyre still intact and Id still wear them if they didnt make me cryBuy them if youre deaf or if you know how to fix the squeak
reviews.review_title: Great for people who cant hear great

they are good shoes, just after a few weeks start to squeak when you walk

squeak Squeak bloody squeak you would have thought that a company as big as Nike and the amount of sneaker’s trainers that are designed and produced by this company that they would use materials that doesn't make this annoying noise as you walk. These trainers arrived quickVery lightweightAnd comfortable
Really enjoyed working out with these trainers, great for jogging. Only down side is that it is too popular lol but its a good value for money

Unfortunately it is past the time to get a refund from Amazon!!

The strap was so poor it came apart . Really disappointed. Have not attempted to use the blue watch yet.I always give good fair reviews on products have purchased from Amazon but this is terrible

I loved this watch until it broke after 3 days of wearing it? The strap has ripped off the pin so cannot be fixed! GuttedYou get what you pay for I guess
Loved this watch easy to see and looks so stylish.
Firstly I orderd the green and got black. But most importantly it worked for a day and then stopped.Its also alot smaller face that I thought.

reviews.review_content: Perfect watch for my mother . Clear and easy to see the numbersSadly the strap fell apart after only 2 weeks. Returned for refund.

I like these watches- I have a few in different colours. This one though, broke in two days! The buckle just came away/off.Not a wearable watch now!
I know this was a barga8n price, maybe a season out if it!  Strap connection and buckle fell to pieces after 3 days!  That will teach me !
Strap not long enough even though only got slim wrists

Just wanted a cheap watch as batteries cost £9 and most watches are too big for my tiny wrists. Looked good and simple, but the buckle fell off as I opened the watch. I got it back on easily enough and “pinched”the sides of the buckle to make a tighter fit on the bar. When I unfastened the watch it fell off again and this time it was a real fiddle to get it back on. I suppose I will have the same trouble tomorrow. So, although it looks good, fits well and is easy to read, without a fastening it will be a waste of time!!!! Think I’ll contact the seller.

The strap on this watch is very short.  Only suitable for a tiny wrist or child.  This is a pity as the watch was good value for money - easy to read.  Even on the very last hole it was too tight for my wrist and I will never be able to wear it.

I know this was a cheap watch but it was a perfect size for my elderly mother for Christmas.  She has worn it from Christmas Day until early February and unfortunately the strap has broken/come adrift.  I cant return it as I bought it in November.  Shame

Love the colour and how large the numbers are; however the band is starting to wear already and the watch keeps getting caught on my backpack straps and clothing sleeves. I wish the strap holes were places slightly further along and there were more of them so I could wear the watch farther up my forearm as it's a nuisance for work when on my wrist.
reviews.review_title: Easy to read at a glance

reviews.review_content: Good watch for price but strap quite small will just about fit on women's wrist

I am rated as severely sight impaired and most times I can see the time. Only sometimes do I need the aid of a torch. However the strap is altogether a different story. I have battled with it and now the little pin has broken off. What is the point of marketting something for those with visual impaiments if you don't male all visual parts large and easy to see? Its like the right hand did the watch and the left did the strap and never was a word said between them. Duh

reviews.review_content: I bought this watch for a loved one in a care home as I wanted a watch that I wouldn't get too distressed about if it went missing. What I didn't expect was how quickly it would become unusable. After well under 12 months, the watch was tarnished and the second hand had fallen off.I've replaced it with the same product, as it's actually quite an appealing watch when new (see pics) but all too soon the watch on the left in my pic, starts to look like the watch on the right.If you buy it with the understanding it won't last long, you'll be happy enough with your purchase. If you think you've found a budget bargain, you may be disappointed.
reviews.review_title: Low price, low quality, short life.

reviews.review_content: Nice enough watch, very clear, comfy. But I'd only worn it a week when I noticed the glass over the face was quite badly cracked. Hadn't dropped it / bashed it to my knowledge - & I've worn a watch for the past 40 years & never broken one like that, so I'd say it's extra fragile :-( .  I shall be wearing a broken watch for the next few months and asking for a new one for Xmas - but it won't be this one!

    I wasn't expecting much at this price point, so obviously you're not expecting this to be a piece that competes against similar looking analogue quartz watches from the budget end of the best known, Japanese maker of well liked, inexpensive models but, in fact, this is really pretty good. Seriously, I kid you not, it's a very presentable, well built looking wee thing.I bought the 36mm model and it sits nicely on my 5⅛ inch wrist.The cashback is undoubtedly made of a decent chunk of actual stainless steel whereas many similarly budget minded watches come with some form of nasty zinc alloy that burns the skin as soon as they're worn for more than a few seconds.My picture showing the rear case shows how crisply the lettering and numbers are formed. This suggests that this watch is far from the cheaply assembled piece of nonsensical junk more often found at this very inexpensive end of the analogue watch range available.The strap is also far better than I expected it to be.I'm impressed that said strap is honestly and openly described as  a leather alternative, where many budget pieces are described as real leather.Not only is the strap correctly, truthfully described but, as you will see if you zoom in on the photo that shows the outer finish on the strap, [the strap] looks, wears and feels like a much more expensive one.So far, the watch is keeping excellent time, as a quartz piece should. Sadly not all quartz movements are so accurate, some of my similarly inexpensive quartz pieces lose seconds per day.There is no minute track on the straightforward, uncluttered dial of this watch, so to check its accuracy precisely it is best set at 12 o'clock when you have it out of the packet and are getting it ready to go.(Slight) criticisms as follow:The crown is very light to turn and can cause the minute hand to move when you're pushing said crown in after setting the time. This is easily dealt with by simply ensuring that it is pushed home with a fingertip at either edge of the crown and keeping your fingers from moving, so preventing unwanted moving of the hands.For me, this is no problem at all, indeed I can think of a certain Swiss "luxury" watch in my collection that does exactly the same thing. It's not a fault, simply a characteristic and not indicative of any manufacturing problem - I couldn't find any of those and was trying!Sum up:A good looking, surprisingly well built watch for a lower cost than a new battery for many quartz watches.Parti ularly impressive for me are the quality of manufacture in both rear cover and strap.This is a real bargain and very far from a hastily thrown together piece of the sort that looks and most frequently is poorly made.Well done to the makers of this for supplying a watch that's actually rather good! I may add another colourway to the collection.Thanks for reading, I hope that my words & pictures have been useful.Happy shopping,Jaye ××

reviews.review_content: These are nice looking glasses and I love the way they’re presented in a Toblerone shaped fold-out case with a magnetic closure, everything is carefully wrapped in a light, silicon soft sheath – one covering each of the legs and another larger one going over the whole glasses.The case itself looks stylish; as indicated, it is triangular in profile and it has a black outer coating with a soft faux suede white lining – and I can’t fault it at all because of this, it’s clear that a lot of thought has been given to its presentation.So why the 2 stars? Well, simply put, I can’t use these glasses… The reason is because they are too narrow, they only measure 14 cm from hinge to hinge and although the legs will tilt outwards on springed hinges the springs are too soft, therefore, the glasses won’t grip or even stay on; when I’m walking they slide down my nose with every step. Or if put them on top of my head they slip off, both forwards or backwards, depending on which way I lean.Therefore, either way I wear these glasses, on my face or perched on my head, they fall off when I move and in just one day I’ve lost count of the number of times I’ve had to catch them. So, for me, they are useless which is a shame because I liked everything else about them.I’d suggest buying these glasses only if you have a small to medium sized head.(Last observation: I bought the blue mirrored lens version, and the photo of the model wearing them shows a gap between the sunglasses’ legs and the side of his head, there’s a shadow there, but on my pair there’s no space at all between the legs and my temples, the legs press against the sides of my head along there whole length).

reviews.review_content: Nothing
The product looks and feels quality. It does its job when wearing it in the sun. Just a little problem for me is that the glass curve a bit soon much on my face.
It was similar to ones I already have and these were a gift for someone who would find them useful.
reviews.review_title: That the item is as advertised

reviews.review_content: I am 93, and find category 3 lenses do not allow enough light for my eyesight,  So will have to return them.H D Thomas
reviews.review_title: Ability to see when using them.

reviews.review_content: For the price I was surprised by the quality of the frame and lens. Also comes in solid magnetic box with glasses bag and cleaning cloth. I have a large head (or so I’m told!) and these look really good. Very pleased.

Compared to my cheapo ones from Sainsbury's that I have bought in the past these are of much higher quality. The whole frame is metal (but I'm not sure what type, maybe magnesium?) and they aren't too heavy, they just feel substantial. For this price you can't go wrong.I have the red pair, and although on the pictures you can't see through the guys lenses; if light passes between your eye and the frame then people can see your eyes but that's no problem. These lenses aren't quite as dark as some which is a good thing; and they really do a great job of taking glare away from light sources and making your vision crystal clear.I'd say I have a medium sized head and these fit me perfectly. Also, the nose pads are adjustable if you apply the right amount of pressure and bend them. This probably isn't the correct way to do this though as you may break them off if you do it too often. In other reviews they have said theirs came with a small screwdriver but mine did not. Not a problem though as all the screws are tiny + screws, to which I have many a driver for.Another thing to note is the case and presentation upon opening the package. I was very impressed and the "softish" hard case that come with them is also a bonus, will surely help to keep them in good condition but the case wont take too much stress. Then again the case will not fit in your back pocket so no chance of sitting on them.All in all, brilliant for the price. I may get a second pair and I'd highly recommend them.Let me know if this was helpful, my first short review.. Thanks!

I dislike nothing at all about these! I praise the quality and quick delivery very highly. I was pleasantly surprised when I touched the glasses frame for the first time, finding they were metal frames. Beautifully finished throughout. I absolutely love them and the price was unbelievable considering the CNC production and finish. Double the price and I'd still be happy!

I bought these to replace my wrap-around sports sunglasses; I figured it's time to grow up a bit and get something a bit more casual.I've had some ATTCL sports sunglasses for quite a long time now, they're in my car and I use them for glare when driving, they're not that dark but they do a good job.I've tried a number of different ones for casual use over the years but always went back to my ATTCL ones. I particularly like the alloy on my old ones. I'm still using them for driving.So I wanted a different style, and an alloy frame, and came back for another pair.I recieved these last week. While I've not had chance to use them in the correct environment (because UK weather), I have worn them to see how they are:They are dark - I mean, very dark; which for my intended use - going abroad in the sun - is perfect. They are a tad bit small initially putting them on my head, but I have a big head that's no big deal - they are comfortable when worn though. The alloy frame makes them feel really well made; they're a bit heavier than full plastic ones but I don't find it compromises comfort.They're honestly great all-round.I think I'll just check out ATTCL ones first in the future should I need another pair instead of trying others and being disappointed.
Solid all metal build. Nice accessories. Good purchase!
Oncoming headlights seem brighter than they used to be.
reviews.review_title: Everyone should wear these when driving at night.

Nice quality
Use these for night driving. I have excellent vision but some of the on coming traffic have terrible blinding lights and these help a lot. For me anyway.

reviews.review_content: Wore these glasses for one summer and the polarisation has gone blotchy after it rained. Will not buy again

However I decided to return them for a refund and two months later I still did not get a refund. I had to pay for international shipping to get the item back to where they came from and I still don't have any response about my refund request!

reviews.review_title: Delaminating after wearing for a couple of weeks

reviews.review_content: Shame they didn’t work . Just made glaring lights yellow instead of white and reduced vision. The packaging was lovely ..it’s a pity the product wasn’t. I tried to return but every time l did the status disappeared ? Eventually after 5 attempts l contacted Amazon directly who refunded me .

These were great sunglasses. I was really pleased when I got them at a great price.However you have to read the small print. The actual quality of the lens coating is terrible. You cannot get them wet or too humid as the coating just rubs off. Leaving patches of no coating. The small print of what you shouldn’t do to the glasses makes them useless for holidays. You can’t get them wet or too humid as the coating comes off. Certainly not experienced this with other glasses I have bought. Customer service offered a 50% reduction on buying another pair or pay to have the original ones sent back.Bought a pair of Nomad glasses which come with a lifetime guarantee on frame and lens. With no small print on restrictions.Would not buy again or recommend to anyone else.

These classes are uncomfortable on the nose. I’ve tried to adjust the nose piece several times but I’m yet to get a nice fit. The glasses are not mirror, or at least not as mirror as they appear in the picture. I should have checked I suppose, so just an FYI really. Also I wish the manufacturers would spent less money on the protective case and divert this money into a better product, just my opinion.
Not I expected forward unfortunately
Don't look the same when you receive them. A bit cheap looking
reviews.review_title: Don't look like the pic. Plastic-y looking

reviews.review_content: These are nice looking glasses and I love the way they’re presented in a Toblerone shaped fold-out case with a magnetic closure, everything is carefully wrapped in a light, silicon soft sheath – one covering each of the legs and another larger one going over the whole glasses.The case itself looks stylish; as indicated, it is triangular in profile and it has a black outer coating with a soft faux suede white lining – and I can’t fault it at all because of this, it’s clear that a lot of thought has been given to its presentation.So why the 2 stars? Well, simply put, I can’t use these glasses… The reason is because they are too narrow, they only measure 14 cm from hinge to hinge and although the legs will tilt outwards on springed hinges the springs are too soft, therefore, the glasses won’t grip or even stay on; when I’m walking they slide down my nose with every step. Or if put them on top of my head they slip off, both forwards or backwards, depending on which way I lean.Therefore, either way I wear these glasses, on my face or perched on my head, they fall off when I move and in just one day I’ve lost count of the number of times I’ve had to catch them. So, for me, they are useless which is a shame because I liked everything else about them.I’d suggest buying these glasses only if you have a small to medium sized head.(Last observation: I bought the blue mirrored lens version, and the photo of the model wearing them shows a gap between the sunglasses’ legs and the side of his head, there’s a shadow there, but on my pair there’s no space at all between the legs and my temples, the legs press against the sides of my head along there whole length).
reviews.review_title: Too small, won't stay on - blue mirrored version

reviews.review_content: I have had numerous pairs of sunglasses from this seller over the years, unfortunately this pair broke just outside of the returns window, arm has become loose
reviews.review_title: Arm became loose after only 2 weeks

reviews.review_content: Comfortable and light. Frame sturdy enough.But see picture not even a year old, purchased Sept 2022 & as you can see on photo right lens coating has come off. They've scratched pretty well & haven't been worn that much. Good price but obviously quality isn't going to be the best.
reviews.review_title: Comfortable & light but quality is bad. Lens coating worn off.

reviews.review_content: I kept these in a bag on a trip and the lenses scratched to the point not wearable. This should not have happened, just a fabric bag. Cheap rubbish I’m afraid. Shame as feel and look ok. But if so cheap a coating, are they really protecting your eyes?

Great hinge mechanism and comfortable fit, feel well built- but they aren't!I've had many pairs of sunglasses before and each have lasted me a decent amount of time with normal use, putting them in a case each time.I wouldn't classify 30 quid to be "cheap" for sunglasses and after a week and a half on holiday, the black metal paint has started to come off, there are micro scratches all over the lenses, and the film has turned black/been removed right in my eye line.I really am quite disappointed with these, considering all the other great reviews.And to anyone wondering, no I haven't been on a beach and thus these scratches aren't from sand, the lenses are obviously just very non-scratch resistent
reviews.review_title: With all these good reviews, I expected much better.

reviews.review_content: Definitely not metal framed!

Nice frame . Very comfortable, specs arrive in a expensive box that isn't necessary .Difficult one as I've nothing to compare with.
reviews.review_title: Specs just turn coming light to yellow

reviews.review_content: I purchased these because I am a rural taxi driver and the evening work on country roads has been a problem when cars with LED Headlamps drive toward me. I needed glasses that took away some of the glare.  These do that to a degree but are too dark to use just to drive as these roads have no street lights and the glasses lenses are very dark and I cant see a thing with them on.  I will keep them to try as a pair of driving sunglasses for day driving in bright weather as they look very smart.  Alas they do not suit the purpose I bought them for.  Seems they are better for Urban Driving where roads have better visisbiity
reviews.review_title: Very Smart Pair of Glasses Sadly Do Not Work For Me

reviews.review_content: I needed to pair of driving sunglasses urgently. Ok until I can get something better. Lenses are a little larger than I expected and darker. Overall quality fits with the price. They'll probably be useful as a backup pair.

Compared to my cheapo ones from Sainsbury's that I have bought in the past these are of much higher quality. The whole frame is metal (but I'm not sure what type, maybe magnesium?) and they aren't too heavy, they just feel substantial. For this price you can't go wrong.I have the red pair, and although on the pictures you can't see through the guys lenses; if light passes between your eye and the frame then people can see your eyes but that's no problem. These lenses aren't quite as dark as some which is a good thing; and they really do a great job of taking glare away from light sources and making your vision crystal clear.I'd say I have a medium sized head and these fit me perfectly. I bought these to replace my wrap-around sports sunglasses; I figured it's time to grow up a bit and get something a bit more casual.I've had some ATTCL sports sunglasses for quite a long time now, they're in my car and I use them for glare when driving, they're not that dark but they do a good job.I've tried a number of different ones for casual use over the years but always went back to my ATTCL ones. It’s a good quality tie I guess but the material is so silky that it’s far too shiny for me to wear.

Upon opening the box and getting the tie out from the plastic packaging, I was quite impressed with the lovely vibrant red colour. It was called burgundy, but had a very good sheen to it and looked great.The material on touch wasn't amazing, but it was decent enough.Putting on the tie though, I wasn't quite impressed, unfortunately, as I started to notice a few quality problems, and on close inspection, there were a number of flaws.First of all, the stitching of the tie at the back is quite poor. It's loose, feels flimsy and just not done very well. The problem with this is that it can easily allow things to get hooked on and damage the stitching.Another issue is the little loop for the thinner part of the tie to slide in to keep it tidy suffers the same issue, but the loop itself has a lot of material flaring out and a lot of loose threads. Again, just not very good in quality.£5.99 for a tie is pretty good, and this being in a colour I really like, I honestly wanted to praise it, but unfortunately the quality is subpar and not quite up to the standard I expected. If it is damaged easily due to the poor stitching, I would rather spend a little more money on a better quality tie so that it will last longer.
reviews.review_title: Lovely colour, decent material, but mediocre quality.

reviews.review_content: My husband really liked the colour and material of this tie but the quality is awful. There was a fold mark in the tie and some kind of stain. I realise it is a low price item but was disappointed.
Has a kind of cheap vibe as a result.Otherwise okay.
reviews.review_title: It’s a bit too shiny for my liking

reviews.review_content: The colour was as expected and the tie has a nice shine to it. The only thing that could be better is the thickness of the tie, it is a little flat. In all a great tie for the money!
It's a great item the only thing is that its ment to be light grey but its more silver. To be fair to the sell it does actually say light grey on the box.

Men's tiesAs we were trying to keep it cheap and trying to help other people out at our wedding, we got a good few of these as spares for people, as it was a very close match to my husband's tie.The tie itself matches the image. The colour is perfect, it's well made, the stitching is all tidy, with no loose areas, or anything like that. The material is decent, it just has more of a shine to it than I expected, this wasn't the end of the world, though as they really aren't much.For cheap and cheerful, I would recommend them. Not bad for the price.

Product is what you imagine you would get at this price point. I purchased for a fancy dress party and worked perfectly for that. I however wouldn’t use it for more formal occasions which is why I gave 4/5
It is glossy, if that’s not an issue for you - it’s good value for money
Quality isn't brilliant but it did its job. Worn for one day for a wedding.
Basic tie that does the job, what's not to like.
Probably wants to be 20cm longer for a grown man.
reviews.review_title: Quality is ok, it’s a bit short though

reviews.review_content: Good solid Black tie for funeral, but also looks smart on casual wear
Very smooth/ silky and very smart
reviews.review_title: It's a tie (Who would've of guessed

reviews.review_content: Great value for money and beautiful material
The tie is a good length and colour is exactly as shown on shopping site. Great value for money.
I bought this for my best friend's funeral, just my own personal nod to his most amazing sparkling blue eyes. Decent quality for the price. Probably will never be used again?....
Ties arrived on time and were exactly what I thought I was getting!
Good length and quality tie.A perfect match to match a local football team.
Looks nice
Beautiful tie, exactly the colour I was looking for and beautiful quality.
Nice quality good size
Good quality
Brought for a funeral, nice and long as had bad experiences with ties on Amazon before
